snippet: The photographer Danilo Scarpati documents Milan Design Week, including an event celebrating Paul Smith’s collaboration with Carl Hansen & Son on colorful new Wegner furniture.
abstract: The photographer Danilo Scarpati documents Milan Design Week, including an event celebrating Paul Smith’s collaboration with Carl Hansen & Son on colorful new Wegner furniture.

headline.main: Photo Diary | Milan Design Week 2014: Salone and Paul Smith
